title: Workshop on Developing a Sound-Rhythm Perception Assessment App for Hearing-Impaired Children

context.prior_knowledge: Basic special education knowledge and mobile app usage experience
context.additional_context: Job-linked program for strengthening the competencies of educators working with hearing-impaired children in smartphone-based learning environments.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the educational app development process using the five stages of the ADDIE model.
Learners can adapt assessment tools reflecting sound and rhythm perception characteristics of hearing-impaired children to mobile environments.
Learners can design microlearning content operable in constrained technological environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
